snippet.title: Immortal Redneck - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Now available on Steam! http://store.steampowered.com/app/595140

Immortal Redneck is a FPS set in Egypt with roguelite elements. The game mixes old-school first person shooter action with roguelite mechanics. Frantic gameplay, twitch controls and an arcade feeling will meet with procedural dungeons, 9 classes with different traits, a complete skill tree and permanent death.
